text.text: The corpse of this boy looks like it's still crying out in pain.
This little girl's body is mangled and smashed, like someone tried stomping on her repeatedly.
This child's corpse has been mostly eaten by flies and other insects.
The young boy lying here has part of his skull caved in.
This girls's remains and mostly liquid at this point.
This departed child is still smiling for some reason. The sight is both spooky AND peaceful.
The body here is completely still. They must have been no more than 9 years old.
The corpse of this person looks horrendously mutilated and is curled up in fetal postiion. It has chunks bitten out of it and its fingers were stepped on.
This man's chest and mouth are completely covered in dry blood. The corpses belly looks bloated and ready to pop.
This tall woman is still wearing some jewelry. Looking glamorous even in death.
The woman lying here looks like she tried her best. Her skin is bruised, scraped, and mauled. There's bloody flesh stuck under her fingernails.
This man is large and heavy, but his size didn't help him survive.
You hear the buzz of insects near this adult cadaver. There's a hole bored in its half-open eye, with a maggot wiggling inside it. Your stomach curls.
Lifelessly this skinny corpse sits still. The pose is almost angelic and the body is clean. You wonder if your death will be so peaceful.
